title: Thai Whine
description: Mrs. Kelly describes the sound as a 'whine'. Who's whining? A Cry From Thailand? Thai Imports? Thai Cry? A lively book about international intrigue, human trafficking, and real estate in Orange County. With that, the fourth novel in the Alex Wright Mysteries beginsâ€¦ Alex, a real estate appraiser in Laguna Beach, California finds love on the Pro Surfing tour. His travels find him meeting surfing legends including Kelly Slater, Andy Irons, and Sofia Mulanovich. With all the excitement and heated competition, you'll wonder what Alex will do next!
author: William L. Mansfield
